page.title: 16MEALS IN GRAFTON
page.content: After we get up the first meal is obviously breakfast.Most people have a slice or two of toast and a bowl of cereal such as "Cornflakes" "Rice Krispies" or "Shredded Wheat". Some people have boiled eggs or bacon and fried eggs often with tomato and mushroom. Dinner or lunch comes next the difference between these two being that lunch tends to be a cold meal whereas dinner is normally a cooked meal. In the summer a lot of people have salad for lunch and a cooked meal at teatime. Most peoples Sunday lunches are different however with meat roast potatoes and vegetables. Most homes have a freezer and some foods can be bought frozen and heated in either an electric or gas oven or a microwave oven.Sometimes complete meals prepared this way can be eaten on your lap as you watch television.
